5.29.24  1:54 am   for the bass on 'Hallelujah,' how did you get the pitch bending so good? Is it a monophonic synth with portamento? and did you do some parts with pitch wheel and other parts portamento? Like specifically just before the F# minor in the last chorus, the bass ditches the bass line and plays 'hallelujah' in parallel with the vocals, and the notes sound kind of trilled/blurred together. The the bass just goes off for the last 10 seconds and i can't exactly tell what it's doing, except i hear it hit a D# and maybe outline a C fully diminished to resolve to the A/E, but the notes don't sound totally articulated or totally portamento'd. How on earth did you get it to sound so expressive?
